item.description:
This is a nice easy, flat hike. Plan on 1.5-2 hours. There is lots of room for the dogs to romp. There is plenty of water out there also.

The entrance to Burrage Pond is off of Route 27 in Hanson.
If coming from Route 3: Head down Route 27 and take a left onto Reed Street. Follow to the end. Cross the tracks and you will see a dirt road and a Space building. The parking lot is at the end of the dirt road. Look for my Jeep.
If coming from the west: Travel down Route 27 and Reed Street will be on your right. Folloow to the end, cross the tracks and parking is at the end of the dirt road.

Here is a map of the Hanson entrance (thanks Garrett)
http://www.openstreet...
item.how_to_find_us: I am driving a blue Jeep Cherokee. My cell # is: (508) 559-3677
item.name: Burrage Pond Hike
